name: Increase plant uptime
note: The idea is to have all the possibilities identified, prioritized to be able to allocate resources

children.name: Reduce operating costs
children.note: Look to reduce operating costs throughout all divisions and locations.  Start with aggregating data.

children.name: Reduce Inventory
children.description: Inventory reductions, review for all sites.
Look to reduce operating costs as description.

children.name: Review supply chain processes
children.note: Perform supply chain review of all steps.

children.name: Introduce automation
children.note: Begin to use automation at all locations and sites.

children.name: Perform failover testing
children.note: Take sites offline to check failover capabilities
